title: Season Start Date Negotiations Are Heating Up. Plus: Most Intriguing Players of the Week. | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC discuss the developments in the debate over the start of the 2020-21 NBA season (1:00), then get into their intriguing free agents, returning players, and draft prospects of the week (15:50).
Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
